text: The XVII Memorial of Hubert Jerzy Wagner was a volleyball tournament held at Tauron Arena in Kraków, Poland from 1 to 3 August 2019. Like the previous editions, 4 teams participated in the tournament. ==Qualification== All teams except the host must have received an invitation from the organizers. {| class="wikitable" style="width:70%;" |- style="background:Lightgrey;" | style="width:20%;
